page.content: 1It is a game for as many children as you want.You have to choose one person to go to one end of the playground and the rest at the other end.The person at the top turns his back to the group and chooses a subject eg animals.Those at the other end each choose an animal. These names are called out.When they have finished,the one at the top turns around,and calls out one of them.The person who has that name,runs to the top and back and says POLO while the first person runs in the opposite direction.If you beat the person at the top,you take her place and restart. 2Players kneel in a circle.They bow down saying"SAD AND SOLEMN OCCASION." One child says something about someone else ,e.g:It is such a sad and solemn occasion that Sister Kate loves Lee.Sad and solemn occasion.Anyone that laughs is out.
